Producer: Aija Berzina, Guillaume de Seille, Alise Gelze, Lukas Trimonis, Isabelle Truc
Screenwriter: Juris Kursietis, Liga Celma-Kursiete, Kaspars Odins
Production Co: Arizona Productions, Tasse Film, Umedia, Iota Production, In Script
Synopsis: A young Latvian butcher travels to Brussels in search of a better wage, but a series of misfortunes leads him to a life of crime.
Title: Oleg
